title: So it attempts to reconnect in the champ select and everyone else too cause i was in a premade
body: I  was in champ select and then it attempts to reconnect. I was in a premade with some friends too and they also were attempting to reconnect. Then it puts me on the 6 minute timer. What is this. You cant punish me for things i cant control.

replies.body: Yup happened here too, full lobby of friends and it dc for all of us, then a timer
Me and everyone in my lobby is doing the same thing. Pretty sure the server is down or some shit.

We haven't been having any known NA server issues today, but it is pretty weird if all of your were disconnected at the same time. I have noticed quite a bit of player's commenting on Charter Spectrum's widespread issues throughout today though, so I'm curious if this might have anything to do with your premade.
Same thing. I was in champ select for a ranked flex game with a friend and it disconnected, he couldn't pick champ, and it gave us a penalty for dodging.
